Author: staunch
Content:
Daily from around 1997 until 2004 or so, since then maybe a few times a year.

Author: brett
Title: IBM's Computing Breakthrough Promises Chips The Size Of Dust

Author: sandoh
Content:
I also used to read it a couple times a day. Now I scan it maybe once in a while.

They don't break any stories to me anymore, it is always a delayed link to something I already read in reddit / digg yc.

Author: joshwa
Content:

-- show news.yc karma in the popup and on the forum page

-- have an area or a email link for feature requests :)

Author: bootload
Content:
"... Do you still read Slashdot? ..."

Started reading in '96, uid of 2774 and I used to read it as much as I read hacknews.yc but stopped after ads started appearing and the sig/noise became unbearable ~ http://slashdot.org/~goon
